name: Storm Retribution
prereq: Storm Order; Tempest Surge Order Spell
summary: You lash out, directing a burst of storming fury toward a creature that has harmed you.
description: You lash out, directing a burst of storming fury toward a creature that has harmed you. You cast tempest surge on the triggering opponent and push that creature, moving it 5 feet away from you if it fails its Reflex save, or 10 feet if it critically fails. This movement is forced movement.
trigger: An opponent adjacent to you critically hits you with a melee weapon or melee unarmed attack.
